mapper.sql: SELECT woc.order_no orderNo, woc.customer_code customer, woc.bar_code barCode, wcs.sku_name skuName, woc.numbers bayNums, wcs.single_weight singleWeight, wcs.single_weight_unit singleWeightUnit, wcshc.bar_code useBarCode, wcshc.sku_name useSkuName, wcshc.single_weight useSingleWeight, wcshc.single_weight_unit useSingleWeightUnit, wccc.left_value leftValue, wccc.right_value rightValue, wccc.use_nums useNums FROM wms_order_info woi LEFT JOIN wms_order_commodity woc ON woi.order_no = woc.order_no AND woi.customer_code = woc.customer_code LEFT JOIN wms_customer_base_info wcbi ON wcbi.customer_code = woi.customer_code LEFT JOIN wms_commodity_info wci ON wci.customer_id = wcbi.id AND wci.commodity_code = woc.bar_code LEFT JOIN wms_commodity_consumables_config wccc ON wccc.commodity_id = wci.id LEFT JOIN wms_commodity_info wcihc ON wccc.use_commodity_id = wcihc.id LEFT JOIN wms_commodity_sku wcs ON wcs.bar_code = wci.commodity_code LEFT JOIN wms_commodity_sku wcshc ON wcshc.bar_code = wcihc.commodity_code
